attributes.title: LOVE THE APP!!!
attributes.review: Hillary trolls LOVE DONALD TRUMP!  They can't stay from his exciting message!!  Pretending to TROLL!!!  All they really want to see is how fantastic Mr Trump's ideas for our Country are!  Don't be ashamed!!üòÇüëç

attributes.title: Make Apps Great Again!
attributes.review: This is a great app. Download it and sign up unless you hate America.

attributes.title: Informative App
attributes.review: Well done!  All the Trump info I need in one spot conveniently on my phone. Thanks!

attributes.title: Stimulating
attributes.review: I got this app out of mere interest in who would participate in it, I'm pleasantly surprised by all the loving supporters.

attributes.title: Fun to Be American!
attributes.review:
Feels nice to feel like an American capable of great achievement vs simply a victim needing the government to come and save us.  

Well designed and executed App.

attributes.title: This App Will MAGA!!!!
attributes.review: This app is a game changer. It keeps his supporters engage. Once again, Trump demonstrates that he's the right Republican candidate to run against Crooked Hillary Clinton.

attributes.title: MAGA
attributes.review: I'm surprised I only heard about this phenomenal app today! The app design is very intuitive, and ranking up is fun!

attributes.title: I didn't know how to MAGA
attributes.review: Until I got the app. Anyone know where the brakes are?

attributes.title: Awestruck
attributes.review:
President Trump this is an amazing app. You are keeping me informed. The liberals are big liars. Thank you for getting the job done. 
A Happy Legal Immigrant

attributes.title: Go Trump
attributes.review: I hope the educated/common sense outweigh the ignorant/misinformed crooked Hillary supporters. It's not all their fault as the liberal media warps their fragile easily offended minds. Great app
